评论概述: For great and lots of compliments
评论详情: I’m 5 ft and was 165lb (36DD) at the time. I got an XL in the olive green color and it fit great. It’s a stretchy material so I had plenty of room and it still looked fitted. It was easy to iron and I loved the pockets. I didn’t even need to wear shapewear with it. Would buy again in another color for another event. Was very flattering on.

This dress exceeded my expectations! I receive so many compliments every time I wear it. The fabric is structured but has stretch. The dress is true to size,  accentuated my curves, is very comfortable, and is professional. I loved this one so much that I just ordered another one from the same brand/company.

评论概述: Still Out on This Dress but Husband Loves It.
评论详情: I am still out on this dress.  I think my problem is that I do not have the correct under garments to wear with it.  The zipper works just fine without me in it, but there seems to be a problem when it is on.  It really is not too tight in the waist but rather it seems that the seam around the waist, which the zipper has to pull through, is difficult to get zipped up when it is on.  Ladies this is a put on the dress before you do any makeup as it goes on over your head.  There is a moment when I think this is not going to fit while going over my head and trying to get my arms into it, but then once that happens it slips on down with no problem.  I would much rather have seen the zipper for this dress placed in the back.  What is up with the side zipper?  By this I mean it does not go all the way up so to help in anyway.  The zipper is just placed in the middle of the side.  Therefore, I really don't see its function.  The material is thick and the tie on it is cute.  Once on, it looks rather smart, but you run the risk of getting makeup on it if you do your makeup first before getting it on over your head.  I usually do my makeup first and then dress.  If you have your hair all done before you put the dress on, it is really going to be a mess by the time you get it on over your head.  There is a slight give to the material.  The navy blue is a solid navy.  It is comfortable after you get it on, but I would suggest to have a great shape wear ready to try on with it.  Mine is on order but has not arrived, so I have not taken a photo of me in it yet.  My husband loved it the moment I came out of the bathroom when trying it on, although he too had a problem helping me get past the waist seam with the zipper.  This is a very form fitting dress showing all your curves.  I am 5 feet 5 inches and weigh around 180 pounds and bought the xxl.  I do not have a problem in my stomach area or hip to speak of.  My waist is 34, my hips are 42 and my bust is 44.  It is has been so long since I bought a dress instead of a skirt that  I am not sure what size in a dress I usually wear but I would say a 14.  My problem is up top.  I am stuffed into a 38DD bra.  I usually wear a 12 in pants depending on the brand.  The length of the dress just covers my knees.  I don't think I will be putting this dress in a dryer anytime soon.  It came quickly and was packaged well.  You can wear this material fall and winter for sure and probably summer if you are in air conditioning.  Sleeves are 3/4.  It is a great dress to have in your closet for a funeral, church, the office, or any special occasion.  Jewelry really shows up nicely on the Navy color.  It looks like a very simple design, but the dress takes on a more formal look when on, especially with heels.  I wish this dress came in even larger sizes to accommodate for any shrinkage.  I will update with a photo as soon as I get the correct under garment of shape wear to put on beneath it.  Hope this review helps.

Beautiful dress, It doesn’t look cheap unless you make it look cheap 🤣.. I have it in black too  same size . If you’re short and you get it tight , if it rides up ( I was 210 pounds when I first wore my black dress) I was tugging it down a lot ( not elegant) .. I’m 5’7 so it wasn’t falling in that sweet spot below the knee  If You are short, you can get away with it being tight because it will still be long and not uncomfortable . I’d say if your big busted don’t worry about the top , it stretches and the girls are covered up & it looks FANTASTIC on curvy girls , Big hips , Big legs , Big tummy .. doesn’t matter it covers a world of sins this dress .. If your thin with not a ton of shape I’d say size down ,way down !!the dress  is not flattering when it’s too baggy  on that body type  . In my opinion it looks frumpy . Now we are all beautiful darlings .. BUT id say if you get this dress super tight & your a big girl ( I was 215 when I wore my black dress in xxl)  , It loses its charm , it’s a throwback to the Jackie O & the pinup era ..If you’re going for Jackie don’t stuff yourself in .. If you wanna be painted on the side of a WW11 plane get it Snug .. Google Joan Holloway from madmen for some inspiration ! Elegant princess kate .. This dress can do both .. Take the time to Hem it if you think it’s too long !  Believe me it’s worth it  This review is long as hell - I hope it made sense I have ADHD lol …bottom line I’m 189 in this video , it could be tighter but I’m wearing it to church & light colors or bright colors have a tendency to look bad if it’s tight .. I wore same dress in black at 215 ish pounds same size XXL - pick a size depending on your shape and purpose of the dress .. people complimented me , a lot .. My husband when I put it in said WOW!!! He never gets that enthusiastic lol .. very genuine reaction
This dress was amazing. It fit perfectly & had a look of quality.

I love this dress. The compliments are amazing. It gives me a professional look for work. I ordered it in large because I have hips and butt. It was a good choice it fit me perfect. It’s a very close fitting dress so go a size up. This a a very very elegant dress. You will be happy wearing this dress

I wish I could have kept this dress because I love the color and the styling and the light weight yet substantial fabric, but I will need to return it because it is skin tight.  I’m 5 foot 6 inches, 140#, curvy, ordered a medium (which is my usual size) and it was very very tight and did not look good or professional as a result and I can’t wear it to work.  This is not a good look if you are curvy unless you love having your caboose stick out like a sore thumb.  I’m sadly going to have to return it.  I think even a large would be far too snug at the waist, hips, and behind.  The top was snug but fit fine. But it looked really bad from the waist down and also rode up on me.

I love this dress. I will be ordering ore colors. This fits extremely well and is so comfortable. Easy to wash. I did not hand wash it, but I washed it on the gentle cycle in a lingerie bag and it was fine.

评论概述: I love this dress.  I used it to dress like Legally Blonde...
评论详情: I would wear this dress anytime.  Very cute.

I didn’t have high hopes but this dress is actually awesome. It has a good amount of stretch and fits great. I ordered the medium but could haves sized down to small (5’6” and 135lbs). The fabric came a little wrinkled and it seems to wrinkle easy when folded, but it ironed out fine. The dress I ordered didn’t come with a belt, but this brand sells belts in the same colors as the dresses so it matched perfect.

评论概述: Looks good, even if you are carrying a few extra pounds
评论详情: So I’m 50 - 5’5”  and 176 pounds-and I’m not athletic- so I have the mid life spread going on, but this dress still looks sharp. This company has some really cute designs. They are classics and don’t really fall out of style. I’ll be back for more!
cute dress, I wore to a 50s birthday party. Flattering and comfortable
Love this dress. I have a light blue one also. I haven't worn the yellow one yet, but I have worn the blue one and I received a lot of compliments on it.

Beautiful dress. Love the color and the fabric. I am 5’2 and 149 lbs, the dress fits well on me. However, it was a long dress, got it altered to give a shorter length. Plenty compliments.  I would recommend this item.

评论概述: Beautiful dress with a perfect fit
评论详情: I needed a black dress for a ceremony, and purchased a few to try out. I didn't wear this one because I felt it would draw unnecessary attention to myself. However, I kept this dress because...WOW! It's comfortable, sexy and hits all of my curves just right. My husband stopped what he was doing when I tried it on, lol!

I used this dress for a ceremony and sorority meeting. I received lots of compliments, the pockets are great. This dress could also be used for a dinner date or similar event. The fit was great, snug in the right places. Seamless undergarments are suggested.

So love this dress! Dress was bought for Founders day event. Super soft ans comfortable to wear. The material is a little heavier than a previous dress but I like it. The length of the skirt is longer, I like that! There was no stains on the dress when I opened it, no odor.  The dress does hug your body, give you a great shape and If you want more hour glass shape then you can wear a shaper. Cost was good for what I got, May buy more colors!

Dresses very flattering and beautiful on only thing I didn’t like about it. The sleeves were a little tight for me on my upper arms, and the neck was a little too high as far as comfort against my neck.

I was probably between two sizes-- I'm 5 7- a little over and also 140, or a little over. I got a large and I think it was a little big but the medium would have been too small. The material is not the highest of quality, but it doesn't look cheap and I love the pockets.

A nice purchase & design.  This dress is so nice that I bought it before in black, navy blouse & green.  However I notice they moved the zipper from the side of the dress to the back  (which is better for the hair).  When the zipper was on the side you had to put on the dress over your head now you can step into the dress & pull it up and zip it up from the back.  This is much better.

The hot pink color was sexy and not tacky. It is machine washable and doesn't need ironing. I bought the Amazon suggested size, and fit perfectly, and really comfortable wearing it to church. I felt very sophisticated and attractive in this dress.
Nice material and great price.
The dress fits perfectly. However, it comes super wrinkled and takes a little bit more effort to iron out the wrinkles. Overall, great dress.

I just received the green colored dress.  I tried it on and it's one of those dresses that make you say to yourself "oh, yeah ok, THIS WILL DEFINITELY WORK!" The fit, the comfort, the style, oh the STYLE!, the length, just the right amount of retro character, not too thick, not too thin material and affordability make this an immediate GREAT I impression. Then, the hubby chimed in, so you know, there's that.😁😁😁😍😍😍  If the dress starts tearing up or doesn't otherwise hold up, I'll do a true review. It just immediately felt good in all the right ways. I also purchased white and now I'll get more colors! Black for sure!!!🖤🖤🖤CLASSIC AND BEAUTIFUL!!!  Can't do 5 stars because I haven't worn it. I only tried it on.
The material was good felt good nice and Stretchy

评论概述: I soooo wanted to love this dress but...
评论详情: Two stars because the fabric is sturdy and stretchy.  The style is really nice.  The problem is that the pleats and pockets don't lay flat but pull out and look really bad.  I am usually a size small or medium.  I tried those sizes then went with a large, thinking maybe that would solve the problem.  Nope.  All three sizes had the same problem, so unfortunately, all are returned.
Quality wasn't that good.  I don't like the material.

评论概述: Most beautiful dress I wear to work
评论详情: I’m a teacher and this dress makes me feel as confident as Joan in Mad Men! I wear it on days I need a little boost. The color is really gorgeous, especially if your game is jewel tones. It’s comfortable, just the right amount of stretchy, and wonderfully flattering, yet light-weight.
The dress is BEAUTIFUL!  I love the stretchy fabric, it’s not very thick but feels wonderful.  The color is exact match that’s shown! The dress looks more expensive than the cost!

I bought this same exact dress in August 2019.  I was in love with this dress.  The material was nice and sturdy,  it fits great, looks good, hugs your curves nicely. To get into the dress is a fight for dear life, but I loved it so much.  So when it got stretched out I purchased two more recently and the material is not as sturdy.  It is thinner than the first time I purchased it.  I still love how the dress fits because I am a plus size person and I like when I can find a dress that agrees with my body type, but the material is thinner and my fear is that it will get stretched out even faster this time because there is no zipper at the back, only at the side under the arm which does not help the fight.  I hope maybe the makers can do some sort of adjustment in the future to make the dress a little easier to get into.  I wear size 40 DD bra, I have a size 38 high waist line and size 55 hips.  Size 2xl fit me nicely.
This dress is very elegant and comfortable
Love this dress it's stretchy so it's very comfortable and it has pockets. The only downside is that it's hand wash only and you can't put it in the dryer.

The dress is ok, the baby pink looks more like a lavender pink, I dislike that it has pockets as it would be more elegant had it not had the pockets.  Its not a summer dress more like an early  to mid Spring dress.I would have bought  several other colors,  but due to it having pockets I wont buy  the dress again.
Just got this for a job interview and it fits me sooooooooooo well!!!! It’s comfy and of course who doesn’t love pockets. Love love love this
Loved the dress and fit. Great material but runs a bit small

评论概述: Fantastic-looking "Mad Men" dress straight out of late 1950s American fashion
评论详情: My wife says, "First impressions: fantastic looking. Figure hugging without being tight or tacky. Very 'Mad Men' style, fantastic color, reminiscent of late 1950s American fashion. Stylish little tie at neck. Nice fabric, though may have a tendency to hold onto wrinkles. (Was not ironed before photos.) Sleeve length is terrific for upper arms of a certain age."  Additional observations: "I recommend it be worn with a smoothing undergarment or slip to keep it from riding up or clinging to underwear. Pointless pockets: I plan to remove them. They are unnecessary and are visible underneath the garment."  Large fits her well. She is 5'7", 151 lbs, 36DD, 40-29-40. This will be essentially a work dress for her and also a dress she'll wear for presentations and introductions on stage. It's not an especially sexy dress, but it's a feminine and trim dress that reminds me of the days long gone when women and men both looked great in the office. It hits a great note blending femininity and professionalism. For that purpose, 5 stars.  EDIT: We bought two more in Merlot and UPS Brown (see additional photos). The Merlot is lovely. The Brown was her idea, and I can't say I've warmed much to it, but the great style of the dress comes through anyway.  Reviewing these photos, I think the look seems to recall a classic stewardess style. Also, the tie arrives loose, which allows for either a bow (shown with green dress) or knotted with loose ends (merlot and brown). I prefer the latter, because it breaks up the bustline.

Dang! I wish I took a photo. The dress is very classy. The only tip I'd advise is to wear a spanx or something of that nature under it, because it shows every pothole you have. Overall, excellent dress for the price!
It’s beautiful. I just need a large instead of a medium, but there are no large left in the lavender color.

Ordered size Medium- I'm 4' 11", 125 lbs. This dress is a must-have item. I want this in every color! It's exceptionally flattering to the figure, with a stretch that's snug but still very comfortable. While the dress will look amazing on any figure, as a curvy gal, I truly appreciate how it contours and highlights my curves without constricting or creating bulges. I particularly like the classic 1950s silhouette & how it complements my frame perfectly, emphasizing the waist & hugging my hips in a flattering way. It's so versatile, it works really well for both, special occasions and a professional setting. It's timeless, classy.

I was so excited to get this dress bc of the color and style and pockets. I would say I mostly love it.  I am 5’ft tall and usually wear a 6 or 8.  The medium fit me perfectly.  It comes to my mid calf which with this style looks very vintage and appropriate. I can easily hem couple of inches for just below the knee.  The thing I wanted to share with the ladies thinking about buying the dress is the material.  I don’t think I have ever bought a dress in this material. It is very much stretchy like mostly spandex so it will hug your curves. If you are a curvy woman you might want to get a larger size as the pockets might not stay closed. It is well made. The material is thick and stretchy. No slit on back but bc of stretch it’s not necessary and it has a hidden side zipper. It is hand wash and dry.  I would love this dress in a ponte material. Def would buy in other colors. Again very well made and beautiful color. I received many compliments on the dress. I recommend it and will purchase another style from this company. Dark green as I expected. Buying clothes on Amazon can be tricky. Hope this helps if you are thinking of purchasing the dress.
Very comfortable, love the color and has pockets! I will totally buy in different colors

This dress was tight in the chest and stomach area, I should have went a size up but that was on me. The material feels thin, and the dress just did not look how it did in the picture. Order at your own risk.
Another great dress. Fits good, very comfortable. I ordered the size XL in body con dresses. This brand is the go to brand, it never disappoint.
I got the flight attendant job!

评论概述: A little snug and short waisted
评论详情: Asian sizing
Good length and fits well.

There’s another similar dress on Amazon without pockets. I purchased both, and this is by far better and more flattering. Something about the placement of the pockets really helps give a nice silhouette . Nice stretch too
Love the material
Maybe runs a little large but excellent value for a versatile dress
The dress fit perfect and was very comfortable. The material stretched perfect and was not constricting.
Purchased for our chapter meeting and it was nice.

评论概述: I’m surprised it fits better than expected!
评论详情: I had 4 days to find a dress for a tea party… FOUR DAYS!! And let me add that I hate shopping because I can never find anything I like, and if I find what I like I’m sure I won’t be able to fit it.  Long story short, I came across this dress, read reviews (thankfully some posted pics with their review), debated on a size to order, and checked out hoping that it would be a successful purchase. And IT WAS! !!  I’m 5’0ft, so the dress went down to mid calf, this was fine because I wore heels. I got so many compliments in this dress and felt beautiful.  My ONLY small complaint is… I don’t care for the fabric so much, but it doesn’t take away how awesome the dress made me feel or look.

评论概述: This dress is a classic and fits perfectly!
评论详情: The reviews had me undecided. I took a chance and I'm very glad I did.  It fits perfectly.  The color is a gorgeous navy blue.  The neckline and "tie" around the collar are timeless.  While I admit the pockets are a bit "different than anything I own and I'd like them a little higher on the dress, I am completely happy with my purchase.  I'm 5'7', 155lbs - 5'11" in heels and it comes just below my knees.

I always read reviews, mainly to determine what size I should order. According to all the reviews, a large would fit me. I am 5'5" and weigh 145 pounds with a size 38C bra. I received the dress and it was almost too small to zip! The only reason I could zip it was that it does have quite a bit of stretch--but not in a flattering way. It was so tight around the abdomen that it stretched the pockets! I do have a little mommy tummy but it made me look five months pregnant. The chest was so tight there is no way I could wear it. It is a shame because on the hanger it is very pretty and looks much more expensive than it is. If you are thin with no bulges anywhere--you will look great in this dress but you will probably still need Spanx! Who writes these reviews?!?!

评论概述: Beautiful! True to size. Got TONS of compliments
评论详情: Bought it in olive. Good quality. Well constructed. Great fit. Form fitting, yet stretchy fabric gives it a polished look. I am 5’4” & wear a size 6, so the small fit me great! So pleased with it! My daughter is buying me one in peach!

This black dress is so flattering, I just love this dress. The length, the style, the fit and the overall look and feel. Super stretchy. I love the sleeve length.  The vintage tie-neck is such a touch of class, giving this dress its total look!  I love the pockets as well, so sophisticated. I totally need this dress in some summer colors.  Update: Purchased the Lavender one!!!! Loving this style!  Indeed, a must-have to your dress wardrobe.

I wore this dress to my flight attendant interview. The dress fit great. I could’ve went a size down, but sized up due to previous reviews. Unlike the previous reviews my dress has a zipper on the back so I was able to step into the dress instead of pulling it over my head. I would purchase again in different colors. I really loved this dress.
In love with this dress!! I read all of the other reviews and saw that it ran small so I ordered the XXL and it fit perfectly! 184 lbs and 5’5 for reference.
Great dress

I am extremely impressed with the dress overall. While it is not the thickest material, it's a stretchy quality. I was skeptical about ordering a small due to my smaller waist and curvier hips. However, because of the material, it fits and hugs my body tastefully and perfectly.  My only (very small) reservation is it is not a pure white; it's more of a pearl-ish white. Next to a pair of true white pumps I have, it's very noticeable that it's, again, not a pure white. Other than that, I love this dress and its fit. It fits "true to size" according to their measurements scale.  SN: If I can edit/update this review and add a photo later, I will.

This is a cute work dress. The material isn’t the best quality, it’s thin, and stretchy. I am 5’3, 25/26 waist, heavy chested, and pretty fit. I think it looks good for the price. I’m wearing a small. If you’re short it is on the longer side. One thing I don’t like about the dress is the pockets. They stick out in a weird way which makes me pull on it constantly.
So beautiful and true to size!! Fits like a glove but is still stretchy and moveable… Very much business attire. I feel so confident for my flight attendant interview coming up!!

First, I ordered "blue" and got navy, though it looks a tad lighter then the navy, but it's def not bright as the blue.  The fabric is a mixed blend but terrible to iron.  Looks a bit sloppy.  Came with some creases that are hard to iron out.  There are at home washing instructions, but it also says dry clean recommended... this is not the price point of something worthy of spending the money to dry clean.  I should have just returned it but honestly thought this would look better after washing.

Beautiful design! Looks very elegant and classy, does not look cheap! The size is very accurate for reference I am 5’10 and weight 139 I bought and L but I had to return because was a little bing for me so I bought a Medium and was perfect! I do not like tight dress lol but medium was perfect also I do not have big boobs so if you are blessed try a large but overall beautiful highly recommend!

评论用户: Do not work,l went my money back?
评论概述: Love the dress but it's too small I need a larger size
评论详情: Love the dress good material but I have to send it back is too small

The dress isn't true to size, I would go up a size. The dress isn't forgiving to pudgy mid-sections and you will definitely need shapewear if you have a bit of belly jelly. Other than that, the fabric is nice and the overall stretch is decent.

I cannot say enough about this dress! NO matter the body type it looks and feels amazing, slimming while also very professional.  The material they use has stretch in it while also no wrinkling.  I'm ready to buy all of their dresses since they use this material on all styles.  Constantly receive compliments on it's fit everything I wear it. I have tired it in other colors too (white needs a lining!). Maroon and hunter green are stunning.

I wasn’t expecting to love this dress as much as I do. It fits great & looks great on me. My mom who is 84 is planning to get one also. My only dislikes are the sleeve length (I don’t like 3/4 sleeves. Be long or short…not in between) the other issue was the odd smell/odor that we smelled. It had a chemical like odor that my daughter said was in her throat. Not sure what that odor was from but not ok.
I love the texture, pockets, length, and overall fitting! Finally found my 'tribe'!
Wish more reviews will put their weight. I'm 5’5 and 125lbs. I love the dress

Omg!!! This dress is the talk of the town. So I bought this dress for a new assignment at my Job which requires me to wear business attire. I had heads turning on my way to work and at work. As I walked throughout the hallways and the elevator everyone was complementing me on my dress. It’s a dress that gets everyone’s attention. I ordered the green in size small I am 5’4 140lbs6 Ladies it does not matter if you’re on the big side or little or if you have curves or no curves or big or little bust, this dress is going to conform to your body type. The material is very comfortable and fits very nice. Don’t hesitate to get one, in fact I’m going to order another one. It is definitely a dress that you want to have in your closet. It’s a great buy and you would not regret it.
Dress is cute, material was good but the color was more army green.

评论概述: MUXXN Women's Midi Pencil 1950s Vintage Cocktail 3/4 Sleeve Tie Neck Bodycon
评论详情: Very flattering and modern appearing.  Great price and arrived quickly!

评论概述: Perfect Dress for Handmaids Tale Costume
评论详情: I’m dressing like Serena Joy from the Handmaids Tale for Halloween 2023. It’s the perfect dress for my costume. I’m glad I bought a XL because it was snug getting it on. The dress is pull on. There is no zipper in the back, just a small zipper on the side. I’m 5’9 190 lbs.
I love this dress. Fits me perfectly. I have it green also and will be buying it in more colors.

I like different and I liked this dress. I like to look good when I go out and show off. I was seeking a white dress for a special event but I had to return the dress due to change of plans regarding the event. I also had to try two different sizes but I was able to quickly decide which size I was best comfortable with. I will seek to purchase again when/if needed.

This dress was great I rcvd so many compliments.the material was great to it wasn’t thin so it had to be pressed really good to get the deep wrinkles. But it was prefect.I purchased a medium and I’m 5’4” 160 if that helps with sizing.i stil had alittle room but it snatched you up in all the right places.

I just opened my package, tried on the brown dress and really like it, although I haven't worn it outside yet.  I will mention that I usually order Large sizes - I'm about a size 8-10 and ordered an XL this time.  So glad I did - I don't like my dresses tight, so I ordered the XL, but it is definitely form fitting.  I still like the dress and may order other colors since this dress has pockets (a must for me as I show dogs and put small treats in the pockets).  Can't wait to wear it but will definitely order the XL rather than the Large.

评论概述: Stretchy Fitting, but not skin tight
评论详情: Stretchy, forgiving material.  I’m 5’2”, wearing a size 4.  From previous reviews, it sounded like this was going to fit skin tight, which I didn’t want to fight any bulges, so I initially ordered a Medium in 2 style dresses.  Once I tried those on, it was clear I would need to alter them.  Because I washed 1 (delicate cycle), and there was no shrinking, I’m going to have to take it in to get hemmed- though the fit is still fine, just a little loose, but it doesn’t necessarily look out of place for the style (sleeveless).  I then ordered a Small in the green neck tie version dress, and definitely felt the difference.  Still comfortable fit, not skin tight, and to a just below knee length for the pencil skirt look.  So I sent the Medium version back.  Plenty of compliments on the green dress!
The dress design is very cute, but the material is clingy which results in the need to order a size above the normal size.  The dress is made well but appears to wrinkle easy.

This dress was beautiful when saw it and when it arrived.  I did have to steam it which is fine but the fabric is very stiff and very tight through the hips & thighs. I ordered a small and the top fit perfect but not the bottom.  Exchanged it for a medium and the top was too loose but the bottom was the same.  Giving this 3 stars because it is a beautiful dress and as long as you don't have curve in your hips, this dress will work!

I added this to my cart several weeks before finally ordering. It fit like a glove! I’m 5’9, 137lbs with a straight silhouette. The material is thick and although it has a small invisible zipper, it isnt hard to zip; and its so comfortable. The pockets are super cute. I bought this in black and will definitely buy another color.
It's a pretty Dress. The material was different from the first dress a bought like this one.

评论概述: Beautiful & good quality, but didn't fit me
评论详情: After reviewing the measurements provided by the seller and looking at other customers' photos, I thought I had purchased the right size - but the waist ended up being too big and the hips were too tight. It might be that the particular cut of this dress just didn't fit my figure.  Anyway, the fabric is very nice - the burgundy is a deep red with no purple/pink undertones.  The neck is a little tight, so definitely put it on before doing your hair & makeup.  After seeing the quality of the dress in person, I will definitely try a different MUXXN style! It's a beautiful dress, it just didn't fit me.
Totally in love with this dress. Style and quality are outstanding.  The navy is a true navy.  Very comfortable.

This is a dress that I am definitely going to order in another color. I had so many compliments when I wore this dress and I rarely find stylish clothing, that's reasonably priced and fits me well.I believe it deserves the 5 star I gave it!!
I got the Kelly green, and it was a beautiful color, and I got a lot of compliments on it. I have one in black as well. Great for work or church.
Cute dress and fits great. After washing it is very hard to get the wrinkle out. I am a small 34x27x35 5”5

I absolutely love this dress!  I have it in several colors and find it to be classy, sophisticated and timely.  The dress can be worn in the office OR dressed up for a special occasion.  The fit is exactly as described so make sure to review the sizing options.  There is some stretch so if you opt for a smaller size, it may work.  Highly recommend.

Please note the sizes run small. I was able to determine as result of me wearing a size 14 dress and I am curvy at the bottom; I need to order a size 2XL.  It fits perfect, the material is stretchy and of great quality and it is thick enough that you cannot see through it. I get compliments on this dress every time I wear it.

评论概述: You will need help tying your bow, to me doing myself the strings not long enough
评论详情: I brought a large. I love the style of the dress and the color good fabric the dress is stretchy to me so it didn't fit tight on me which is good . My only dislike is I couldn't tie a pretty bow and I wish the string was long enough for me to do it myself with that being said get help with that part and you will be satisfied
Love it
I love the material and the way it fits, wish it was just a tad bit longer
Beautiful Dress!! Fit perfectly!!
I bought this for a funeral and received many compliments. The length is slightly past the kness and has 3/4 length sleeves. True to size. This fits like a glove and the best part? It has pockets!

Originally ordered a small which is my normal size, but it was too fit to wear for Pentecost Sunday, so I ordered up to a medium.. which was still a little tighter than I expected, but it was a nice dress. I can’t really tell you if you should order a size up or two…

评论概述: Pleats and pockets should not be stretched out and open!!!
评论详情: I ordered a size,  at least up. I usually wear a 6, but mostly and 8 or 10! I don't like tight clothes. So as per others suggestions I went up... to a large! I came stand when things have pleats or pockets and they won't lay flat! Or that awful pulling/stretching across front at the hips. To mean that screams TOO SMALL! I'm curvy but not drastically so. I'm probably about 5'3" and ~160 lbs. Mostly muscle, but not all muscle!

I love this dress! It is true to size. It is cotton with spandex so please do send to the cleaners. It is so prim and proper. I put a belt around the waist and was all set. It has a side zipper. If you’re in doubt, you may want to size up, it will not hurt, you will just have a little more room.
Cute and neat dress, but color easily wash out.

评论概述: Very cute, but runs on the small size.
评论详情: I purchased this for my mom, who is a size M. The dress is really cute, however it runs small. So, I had to exchange by going up two sizes to fit her comfortable.  I would havr loved one for myself as well, but I would need a wayyy larger size.
